Name: Princeton Martini
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The Dry Martini meets the Gimlet . They should meet more often.
Nutrition: One serving of Princeton Martini contains 152 calories
